dmca.title: [ABUSE] MoneyGram Name/Logo Use
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of The Planet Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Monday, May 22, 2006 11:08 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] MoneyGram Name/Logo Use]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] MoneyGram Name/Logo Use]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
the address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] MoneyGram Name/Logo Use
Date:         Mon, 22 May 2006 11:48:10 -0400 (EDT)
From:         trademarks@moneygram.com
To:         abuse@theplanet.com



*_05/22/2006_*

Abuse

1.17.38



Re:  Use of MoneyGram name/logo(s) on the Internet



Dear Website Owner:

            It has come to the attention of Moneygram International,
Inc. and its affiliated entities (collectively "Moneygram") that you are
currently using the Moneygram name/logo(s) ("Marks") on your Website
located at http://www.egoldeasy.com/.  As detailed below, Moneygram
demands prompt corrective action to end unauthorized use and misuse of
the Moneygram Marks by your Web site.



Moneygram is the owner of the U.S. trademark registration for the
Moneygram Marks used on your Web site.  Moneygram has ownership and the
exclusive right to use the Marks.  Your misuse of the Moneygram Marks
violates Moneygram's exclusive rights in it trademark under the federal
Lanham Act under Title 15 of the United States Code, Section 1125, among
others, and applicable state law.



Accordingly, we formally demand that you promptly do the following to
resolve this matter:

1.)  Cease and desist from all use or intended use of the Moneygram
Marks and any marks confusingly similar to the Moneygram Marks;

2.)  Refrain from using any design marks owned by Moneygram; and

3.)  Inform us by responding to this e-mail no later than *twenty days*
from the date of this e-mail, that you have complied with the
requirements above.



Moneygram views this as an extremely serious matter that requires prompt
action by you.  Moneygram has a range of effective legal actions and
other remedies available if you do not promptly comply with its demands.



This e-mail is written without prejudice to any claim for damages or
other relief that Moneygram may have in the event that litigation
against you and your company might prove necessary.



Sincerely,





MoneyGram International Legal Team

1.17.38



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEceHqvK/XpJs6oyURAqumAJ99VpFsagNxe9412gNWKgrZ5X830gCgmGDg
vwYqWAqmk++V4V6x3TGIzfY=
=Ee8T
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
dmca.principal_name: Moneygram International, Inc. and its affiliated entities (collectively "Moneygram")
